entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
